item.title: Word Lens assists travelers in translating signs instantly
item.description:
Quest Visual, the company behind the augmented reality app Word Lens, has decided to offer the app and all of its language packs for free for a limited time. This includes languages like English, French, Italian, Portuguese, and Russian. This gesture of thanks to their users comes as the company transitions to new ownership under Google. Source: Word Lens page on Play Store. You can download the Glass, Android, and iOS versions of Word Lens from the Quest Visual website...

item.title: The language learning app HelloTalk has reached 1 million downloads
item.description:
Source: HelloTalk app page at the Play Store. The mobile language learning app HelloTalk has reached over one million registered users globally, according to its developer, HelloTalk. The HelloTalk app allows users to teach each other their native languages using their mobile devices. Users can communicate in real-time with native speakers through various features, helping them practice their target language. Over one million HelloTalk users, representing over 200 countries, use the app to learn various languages...
